roleset.name: sign automatically, without reading, like a robot.
roleset.note: ROBOSIGN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, sign.01. No VNcls. (from robosign.01-v)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: It seems that our representatives , many of whom are lawyers , including Rep. Baldwin and Senator Feingold , have something in common with the lawyers that-1 *trace*-1 have been " robo signing " foreclosure documents .
